userProperties.name: Task Details
userProperties.value: All files with ".txt" format are deleted

dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryDelimitedText2
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DEPTNO as string,
		DNAME as string,
		LOC as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UserQueryDelimitedText2

dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryDelimitedText2
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DEPTNO as string,
		DNAME as string,
		LOC as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['PowerQuerySink.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UserQueryDelimitedText2

dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryDelimitedText2
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		DEPTNO as string,
		DNAME as string,
		LOC as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['GroupByPowerQuery.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> UserQueryDelimitedText2

scriptLines: Address as (State as string, Country as string, PinCode as string),
Contact as ({phone } as string, Email as string)

sources.name: DS_EMP_DEPT
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DS_EMP_DEPT

sources.name: DS_DEPT_SOURCE
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DS_DEPT_SOURCE

sources.name: DS_EMP_DEPT
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DS_EMP_DEPT

sources.name: DS_EMP_DEPT_SOURCE
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> DS_EMP_DEPT_SOURCE
